pr_title: Adds StringPropagationAdapter to migrate off non-string propagation keys

timeline.message:
Adds StringPropagationAdapter to migrate off non-string propagation keys

We formerly deprecated propagation factory methods that return non string
instances. This stops us from using them internally, and provides a bridge
for tools like zipkin-aws and zipkin-gcp to migrate with.

timeline.bodyText: this is needed for secondary sampling to set localSampled conditionally. A future PR will integrate that... just I needed to make sure only String keys are possible before proceeding.
